mapper.select: select p.product_id, u.nickname, u.job, p.title, p.commission, avg(r.star_point)as avg_star_point, count(r.review_id)as review_count, p.createdAt from product p left join user u on u.user_id=p.seller_id left join review r on p.product_id=r.product_id group by p.product_id order by ${sort} desc limit #{paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex}, #{recordsPerPage};
